Modify channel information

Source: R/channel_management.R
channels.Rd

Get or set the contents of the channel information inside eegUtils objects.

channels(.data)

channels(.data) <- value

Arguments

.data

eegUtils object to view
value

Value to replace `chan_info` structure with.

Examples

channels(demo_epochs)
#>    electrode   cart_x    cart_y  cart_z sph_radius   sph_phi   sph_theta
#> 5         A5 -50.2438   53.1112  42.192   84.41211 29.988986  133.410838
